questions.question: What typographical convention is considered best practice when writing Javascript?
What is the DOM?
options: The protocol that websites use to talk to one another in a structured manner
A programming language that allows for faster runtime in environments meant for legacy software
A model (tree) of all HTML elements in an HTML document. Useful for Javascript to read, modify, add or delete content
A piece of software that dominates submissive software, allowing for prioritzation within modern web applications

questions.question: Javascript is a subset of the Java programming language.
